titles.title: A bill to provide for the self-employment tax treatment of qualified withdrawals from a capital construction fund account under section 607(d) of the Merchant Marine Act.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S1470-1471)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 2/4/1993--Introduced. Amends the Merchant Marine Act, 1936 and the Internal Revenue Code to provide that in determining net earnings from self-employment, the basis of a vessel, barge, or container shall not be reduced by any qualified withdrawal from a capital construction fund.
